page.title: 07Living in Himbleton
page.content: Being a rural community there is alimited amount of entertainment within the area and therefore families with children (of pre-driving age) tend to be a close knit unit. With the children of varying ages going to different schools - some in Himbleton , some in the nearest town meal times at home do vary. In our house breakfast usually consists of cereals and/or bread or toast with a drink of tea or fruit juice. Because of school times lunch tends to be a light meal with the main meal of the day in the evening when the whole family eat together.
